name: IBM MQ V8 on a single virtual machine - VMware vSphere
description: Install and configure IBM MQ on a single Linux Node.

metadata.displayName: IBM MQ V8 on a single virtual machine
metadata.longDescription: Install and configure IBM MQ on a single Linux Node.

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description:
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6
Ubuntu 16.04

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
1 virtual machine:
IBM MQ Instance instance

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. IBM Knowledge Center for IBM MQ 8.0 - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/SSFKSJ_8.0.0/com.ibm.mq.helphome.v80.doc/WelcomePagev8r0.htm
3. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
